ygData.messageBody:
Anyone else experience this - judging by postings on the tech boards - there
are quite a few others.

Post-patch I get 1.5 second pauses every 5-10 seconds or so. If I kill of
EVERY background program (except my firewall - can't live without that) - it
helps - so that the pauses are 1 second ever 15-20 - but it's still there...

I have a high end system (Athlon 800, Geforce2 GTS) - so it's clearly not a
performance issue. Also - turning off sound, and setting display options to
the minimum make no difference whatsoever...

Slyde
